Articles.Content: If I have a spaceplane, with plenty of lift, that can land from orbit on Kerbin and get back to orbit from Kerbin, will it also do so on Laythe? I don't care if it's overbuilt, I just don't want to get stranded on Laythe.
Yeah. If it works on Kerbin, it will work on Laythe. Just watch your speed, it's easy to overshoot the little patches of surface on Laythe.

> 
> Spammed airbrakes, got it.

This needs to be added to the KSP Mantra:

1. Moar Boosters
2. Moar Struts
3. Moar Airbrakes
